content: Simplicity is the soul of efficiency.
author: Austin Freeman

content: The future depends on what we do in the present.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

content: Discipline is choosing between what you want now and what you want most.
author: Abraham Lincoln

content: Resilience is born from facing the storm, not avoiding it.
author: Alex Unnippillil

content: Leadership is unlocking people's potential to become better.
author: Bill Bradley

content: Focus is a matter of deciding what things you're not going to do.
author: John Carmack

content: Growth is never by mere chance; it is the result of forces working together.
author: James Cash Penney

content: Mindfulness isn't difficult; we just need to remember to do it.
author: Sharon Salzberg

content: The best way to predict the future is to invent it.
author: Alan Kay
